name: Hidden Investigation 3: Crime Files
description:
Solve one mystery after another to unravel a larger conspiracy that will lead you to your final case. But beware; it may drag you into the abyss forever!

Following her previous cases, Agent Sarah is challenged with a new mystery. Use your wits, detective instincts and when all else fails, your six-shooter in this action-packed puzzle game with immersive storylines and a dark mystery that will quickly draw you into the world of Agent Sarah.

Features
  • Engaging and beautiful artwork
  • Hours of gameplay
  • An Immersive Storyline
  • Innovative Hidden Object scenes
